A cactus-like wood type.
I'm not sure how to replant it...
lore.biomeswevegone.maple_sapling.expand: A good tree, unfortunately named after a former friend.
lore.biomeswevegone.red_maple_sapling.ex: The tree name reminds me of Canada...
lore.biomeswevegone.skyris.expanded_tool: A foreign type of tree found by that hare.
lore.biomeswevegone.yellow_sakura_saplin: A type of tree that seems to be popular with anime watchers.
lore.biomeswevegone.white_sakura_sapling: A type of tree that seems to be popular with anime watchers.
lore.create.hand_crank.expanded_tooltips: A hand-turned crank to power my saw.
lore.create.mechanical_saw.expanded_tool: A saw utility. Good for cutting down trees fast.
A nice flower. Too bad I don't need it...
lore.minecraft.birch_sapling.expanded_to: A nice, white type of tree.
That kind of hurts, but it gets me green dye.
lore.minecraft.calcite.expanded_tooltips: I know a gnome friend who likes these.
lore.minecraft.cherry_sapling.expanded_t: A type of tree commonly used by weebs.
lore.minecraft.dark_oak_sapling.expanded: I know a gnome friend who likes this kind of tree.
lore.minecraft.dandelion.expanded_toolti: A nice flower. Too bad I don't need it...

An essential building lore.for farming.
Need to find me a lot of these...
lore.minecraft.green_banner.expanded_too: The color is almost after my favorite color...
lore.minecraft.kelp.expanded_tooltips.de: I almost wish I could smoke this.
lore.minecraft.oak_sapling.expanded_tool: An oak tree. The easiest type to farm.
lore.minecraft.obsidian.expanded_tooltip: An element for nether portals. Really hard to break...
lore.minecraft.player_head.expanded_tool: The disembodied head of a player.
lore.minecraft.powder_snow.expanded_tool: A terrible lore.that inflicts entrapment and cruel cold.
lore.minecraft.sand.expanded_tooltips.de: The hare can give me dirt if I get her this.
lore.minecraft.spruce_sapling.expanded_t: A spruce tree. An easy type to come across.
lore.minecraft.sugar_cane.expanded_toolt:
A good item for making Paper.
How do I farm this again?
lore.minecraft.torch.expanded_tooltips.d: A simple utility that brings light.
lore.minecraft.tnt.expanded_tooltips.des: A simple bomb. Are these Taph's?
item.minecraft.apple.expanded_tooltips.d: A healthy snack while you work!
item.minecraft.bone.expanded_tooltips.de:
A good treat for a good boy.
When crushed up, it makes a good fertilizer.
item.minecraft.bone_meal.expanded_toolti: An amazing fertilizer for grass and trees.
item.minecraft.diamond.expanded_tooltips: A solid ore for making tools.
item.minecraft.diamond_axe.expanded_tool: Whiteclaw wants another victim. And mending.
item.minecraft.diamond_pickaxe.expanded_:
A good utility for mining Obsidian.
I should get Mending before I main one of these...
item.minecraft.diamond_shovel.expanded_t: A tool for the long haul.
item.minecraft.dried_kelp.expanded_toolt:
A sea-based item for eating.
Kind of stale and hard to eat...
item.minecraft.ender_pearl.expanded_tool: I can throw these on my own, why do I need these?
item.minecraft.iron_ingot.expanded_toolt:
A disposable ore for throwaway tools.
Also good for making lore.!
item.minecraft.milk_bucket.expanded_tool: A simple drink to take off the buzz.
item.minecraft.water_bucket.expanded_too: A good MLG trick. But touching water hurts...
item.minecraft.wheat_seeds.expanded_tool: I used to throw these away. I still do.
item.aether.blue_berry.expanded_tooltips: A nice snack. It seems to come from another universe...
item.aether.zanite_ore.expanded_tooltips: Amazing gems that speed up as they wear down.
item.aether.zanite_shovel.expanded_toolt: A fast shovel, but by the time you noticed its speed, it's too late.
item.aether.gravitite_shovel.expanded_to:
A very efficient mining tool.
Makes dirt, gravel and sand go bye bye if you right click!
item.farmersdelight.onion.expanded_toolt:
An alright snack.
I should bake with these instead of eating them raw...
item.origins.orb_of_origin.expanded_tool: A shiny orb that lets you change your family lineage.
